https://sagespace.au/community-spotlight-costa-zacharia/

Hi Corbin,

Sorry for the delay,

We have updated the site.
The Renew Price has been updated as well.

The blog page loop will be the list of posts: https://sagespace.au/wp-admin/edit.php

Here is the blog page.
https://sagespace.au/blog/

When click the post are redirected to their link.
https://sagespace.au/what-to-eat-for-stronger-teeth-and-gums/

Let me know if this works for you?
Sorry @heath Yes, I've been working on this one. I'll update corbin.
@joel @rica This ticket seems to have been open for a while and the client has not been updated. Have we made any progress with it at all? Thanks :)

Hi team,

Just checking in on the above?

Also, can we change the price of "The Renew" to $90 on the website (from $80)

Much appreciated

Dr Corbin Barry (BDS)

action.text: Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

Nathan has been working on our monthly newsletter which incorporates the pages on our website for people to read the articles.

I'm wondering if we could look at a reformatting of this page to have a universal blog page that these articles can be added too but also a tidier format.

I am thinking we have a singular page with tiles that can be clicked to link to the article as a pop-up? I've tried to draw a couple of wireframes for reference.

When opened from website:


When someone clicks the link on the newsletter it directly opens the blog post:


Let me know if this makes sense and can be done

Thanks

Dr Corbin Barry (BDS)
Founder & Director
